phrases: hajimete no kimochi my first feelings
shonbori no mune ni upon my downhearted chest
sotto nagerareta hidamarine a sunny ray of light was gently thrown
sora miageta toki when I looked up at the sky,
haru ga soko ni kiteta spring was near,
kowareru omoiwa these trembling feelings are
sukininatte iino is it okay for me to fall in love?
tamerau kokoro ga my hesitating heart
bureiki kakerukedo put on my brakes,
ikiga tomarisou desu I cannot breathe
You used to wear those too?
Looks like middle schoolers from the country.
He owns a tea shop in the neighborhood.
It looks like it might snow.
You must have left home very early to get here this early.
We just suddenly decided to come.
I slept over at my brother's house last night.
You guys must get along very well.
That is just for a little change of mood.
Oh yes, the shampoo you gave me last week, it is so good...
I think it is because a tile is cracked.
I guess it cannot be helped.
That is because the kid next door...
Even if that is so, this is so bad.
You really do look like a middle schooler from the country.
Just because there are not many photos of you, brother.
Your collection of compositions from elementary school.
My dream is to become a beautician.
That is because my mother is a beautician, so I want to take after her.
I will call my mother, father and brother and we will all live together.
Then I think it will be a lot of fun.
It does seem like a lot of fun, though.
Your husband is going to have a tough time.
Sorry for dropping in all of a sudden.
You actually helped me out a lot.
At this rate, I would like you to come everyday.
Be careful on your way back.
I do not mind either way.
If you are okay with it, then I do not care which.
Do not say things like that.
I do not know... what to do... so easily...
If you are not sure, then let us just go home for now.
I think it is fine to go home and then think it over.
That is why I said that I am fine as long as I am with you, brother.
And in the end, we are still alive.
Unable to find the answer to...
What the right thing to do is...
What are you going to do from now on?
You sure do have absolutely no direction in your life.
If you are not able to do anything anymore, then you should just come back.
If I am not able to do anything?
Do you really think it will solve itself?
I said that I would not say anything anymore, did not I?
I cannot wish you good luck, but...
Do you want to do some karaoke on the way?
Sorry, but there is somewhere I have to go.
She does not hang out with us much anymore.
I bet it is a boyfriend.
Do you want to follow her?
I want to see what kind of guy he is!
You guys peeped at my date!
The one thing I do know is...
Suburban shopping malls are the trend of life.
But if this place is gone, then I think that many people will be sad.
Actually, there are more people in favor than in opposition.
There is not that kind of an institution around here, so...
I think many of the residents felt that it was inconvenient.
I feel that destroying the row of trees would be wasteful.
But I guess you cannot do business with just sentiment.
I thought you said that it was fun even if it was not moving?
You sure are hard to please.
But... it is better if it moves.
I bet it would be beautiful.
I wonder if we cannot move it.
I was wondering if we can move it somehow.
You do not know unless you try.
Come on, you try praying too.
Do not give up so easily.
Are not we doing something stupid?
You are the one who started it!
Every year, when it is spring.
Do you want to take a bath at my place first?
yasashii yume ga a gentle dream
sotto mune no haru wo yobi calls the spring in my heart
yasashii kaze ni nari and becomes a gentle breeze
kimi ni furete satteyuku that touches you then leaves
chiisana potto ni wa in the small pot
daisukina kimochi are feelings of love
ii kaori nosete that carry a sweet scent
kono toki wo atatamete warming up this moment...
futari dakara wakaru koto things we understand because it is the two of us
kotoba janakute are not just words
hohoemu dake negaudake we just smile, we just hope
shizukana sora e to the quiet sky
ashita mo mata aeru yo ne we will see each other again tomorrow...
shizukana sora de at the quiet sky
